Full Description: (v)WeCare Technology is an international call center outsourcing company. The enterprise strives to deliver groundbreaking solutions to companies in different industry verticals. (v)WeCare Technology’s headquarters are in the United States and it carries out its operations through offices in India. The company that had a modest beginning in 2003 soon grew into a full-fledged organization. The idea behind (v)WeCare Technology’s foundation was a desire to provide excellent customer care to companies all over the world. No doubt, (v)WeCare Technology has proved its mettle time and over again. The company faced adversities with courage and made every possible effort to convert threats into profitable business opportunities. Despite a lot of competition from industry bigwigs, (v)WeCare Technology continued its journey fearlessly and chose to give a deaf ear to criticism. (v)WeCare Technology was quick to realize that every contemporary organization bows down to innovation. This is the reason the company took an initiative to set new industry trends with innovative business solutions. (v)WeCare Technology uses state-of-the-art technology and valuable industry insights to provide exceptional services to its customers. The company has worked meticulously to understand the requirements of customers. To keep the good work going, (v)WeCare Technology has incorporated services like CRM, software development and application, IT consultancy and networking solutions in its service cart. This is in addition to the conventional contact center services like e-mail support, live chat and customer care services. The latest addition to the company’s offerings is robust IVR services. (v)WeCare Technology values the confidence and trust of its clients. The company has never resorted to cookie-cutter solutions, despite the dearth of time and business pressure. This is the reason the company is known for its ability to deliver the best in the time-frame specified by its client. (v)WeCare Technology completely understands the significance of confidentiality and makes sure that the information provided by a client is used only in the interest of that particular client. With a magnificent management team of nearly 35 members, (v)WeCare Technology has been constantly soaring its height in the realm of BPO services as well as in Telecom billing services. Today it boasts more than 2000 employees in its different verticals. Equipped with leveraging technologies and Cisco powered IP network, the organization has been rendering excellent services to its clients overseas. Some of its services are listed below: •	Call answering services •	Back-end and technical support •	Chat and email support •	Software development including Telecom billing software •	Website designing and development •	Infrastructure management services •	Data Analytics Solutions •	IVR services - Hosting & Development •	Social Media Marketing •	Web based research activity •	Finance and Administration outsourcing •	Customer Relationship Management •	Customer Retention Services •	Telecom Billing and OSS solutions •	Retail Call Center •	Call Center Outsourcing Services What Modules it consists: (v)WeCare Technology being the one stop hub for all you telecom billing and OSS support consists of different module. Viz,: o	Lifeline ETC Module: This module provides for validation of addresses and credentials, duplicate checks, 497 reporting and a lot more. o	Activation Module: Activation module enables subscribers to sign up quickly in our system. o	Agent Portal: This module enables the agents to get their quick performance update over the internet. o	Billing Module: This module enables mailing of e-bills depending on dates and anniversaries. It is also integrated with some of the major payment gateways.  o	Inventory Module : (v)WeCare inventory module enables the users to accomplish orders on a first in first out basis. o	Data Analytics & Reporting: This module allows preparing of various like, reports sales report, agent performance tracking report, etc.  o	CSR Module:  CSR module helps you to know your customer well.

Description: 12 Bridges provides a cloud platform as a service for IoT and data analytics driven cloud services and applications services.
Full Description: Unleashing the business value of data. 12 Bridges is a software and services company providing a cloud platform as a service for IoT and data analytics-driven cloud services and applications services across multiple market segments, including but are not limited to, consumer and commercial appliances, transportation and logistics, health and wellness, and smart buildings, campuses, and cities. For connected sensor, device, and mobile app makers, our platform provides an end to end solution for adding cloud connectivity and data-driven service revenue streams to those devices that save time and money developing, deploying and operating an IoT product, while also enabling new revenue streams for their device data and context. For data and analytic-driven service providers, our platform provides an efficient and scalable path to access IoT or connected device data and end customer context for analytics to enable responsive service integration into those devices. The platform can be deployed in a vertically integrated fashion for customers who want to implement both the devices and the connected services, or it can be leveraged as a multi-sided market connecting device makers, data provider, service providers, and analytic or visualization app developers together both technically and commercially. The platform is cloud infrastructure agnostic, so customers can choose their preferred cloud infrastructure provider and avoid being locked in, or even deploy in a private data center.

Description: Preparing for sales meetings & calls is hard, time consuming. Get 1 page summary minutes before a meeting, search less and sell more!
Full Description: Problem 1. Typical business user in a company of 50+ people, use at-least 8 different applications. Customer information is scattered across these applications like Email, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) apps, Support software, Documents in Storage software etc., and many internal applications.  2. For a meeting or call with customer, business users spend lot of time preparing, searching across these applications and also for researching on web, users look for LinkedIn, Google for news, etc. Close to 30 mins will be spent to do proper research, opening multiple windows. 3. Salesforce internal metrics say 70% of the calls and meetings never make it to CRM, intentionally or unintentionally. This actually leads to lot of incomplete data and drastically affects revenue prediction and business continuity in case of person leaving the company or moving up the chain. Solution 1. 1 Page integrates almost all the applications that are commonly used by any organization and can integate any internal applications faster and customize the data quickly, for organization or role or individual. With 1 Page, organization can drastically improve adoption of CRM or any tool purchased or built. 2. Few minutes before a meeting, 1 Page alerts the user to prepare for meeting. User will get one page summary per attendee, with all recent emails between user and attendee, CRM data like account, opportunity info, files needed etc. Users can make notes for the meeting. Alerts also come when user gets a customer call. 3. Once meeting or call is over, 1 Page automatically logs the meeting to CRM, and prompts the user to record meeting/call details. User can leave a text note or voice note and is stored in CRM. Next time when user checks the profile of the customer, these notes will help them to recall past meetings/calls. Salient features Based on Indian patent filed in 2013, India patent grant in final stages. US Patent via PCT granted 2 more patents pending on ML/AI - Implementation to go live by end of this year Users can get started in 30 mins max Near Zero IT involvement  Encryption at rest, in transit  Works in Multiple Languages, can add a language in days New integration in days and customization in hours

Full Description: WHO WE ARE 24 Proof based out of the Silicon Slopes in Utah. WHAT WE DO We Hack it  We curate coders by invitation only, and then we match them to projects and clients after they have proven their skills to us.  Our hack it platform allows clients to hire directly or assign project work to coders.  We Build it   Clients come to us with a need which we then assign a lead developer to address. This need quickly turns into a development plan with estimate and timeline.  When client agrees, we build a team using our curated coders and work begins. We Prove it  We will test or pre-screen applicants for you all major programming languages for them to prove their knowledge not just answer simple CS based questions, real programming you pick from a growing library to cover actual work on the job, not silly questions. We Run it  Our proprietary software runs online hackathon, allows for coders to push code, clients can demo and choose the winner. We track user volume via a custom point system that as coders place and clients have successful projects, they both earn additional benefits. We Staff it  Our platform is built to support introducing positive experiences and allows for placement in addition to our Hack it, Build it.

The company’s solutions are implemented in 90% of the NFL stadiums, 90% of the MLB ballparks, 77% of the NHL arenas, 79% of the NBA arenas, over 60 NCAA FBS football venues, 100% of the International Speedway Corporation (ISC) tracks, 87% of the tracks where Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series races are held, and 12 MLS Soccer stadiums. Many of the largest music festivals, air shows, and major events such as the Super Bowl, College Football Championship Game, World Series, NBA Finals, and Kentucky Derby have utilized 24/7 Software software solutions. 24/7 Software’s international customers include The O2 Arena in London, Lord’s Cricket Ground in London, Rogers Arena in Vancouver, Rogers Place in Edmonton, Air Canada Centre in Toronto, Melbourne & Olympic Parks Trust in Australia, Marvel Stadium in Australia, and FC Barcelona in Spain. 24/7 Software is also used by leading organizations including corporations, convention centers, shopping malls, amusement parks, schools, and airports.

Description: 2FA is a veteran-owned, cybersecurity company created on the single vision of simplifying authentication.
Full Description: Founded in 2006, 2FA Inc. is a veteran-owned, cybersecurity company created on the single vision of simplifying authentication. 2FA’s products integrate authentication and single sign-on (SSO) into a single solution. 2FA serves customers in diverse industries including: public sector, healthcare, energy, manufacturing, and finance; with special focus on industries where compliance requires the adoption of authentication. 2FA supports over 1,000 customers and millions of users around the world, including deployments in all 50 states and over 25 countries. Supported customers range in size from well over 1,000,000 to less than ten users; including several of the largest US city-based authentication deployments for CJIS compliance, leading healthcare organizations, and global enterprises. 2FA has emerged as the cybersecurity leader for authentication. 2FA’s products support fingerprint biometrics, smart cards and tokens, RFID cards and devices, magnetic swipe cards, One-Time Password (OTP) tokens and devices, Risk-Based Authentication (RBA), and barcode devices on a variety of operating systems and hardware platforms. Industry specific solutions are available for public sector, healthcare, and energy that are designed to streamline adoption of line-of-business applications, increase productivity, and user satisfaction.

Description: 2GeeksinaLab has developed content protection designed to eliminate piracy (casual & professional) from physical media (CD, DVD, etc) as
Full Description: 2GeeksinaLab has developed content protection designed to eliminate piracy (casual & professional) from physical media (CD, DVD, etc) as well as content downloaded via the Internet.  Global Garde™ utilizes a multi-randomized, polymorphic quantum physics encoding approach to content protection (now that's a mouthful!). In other words, Global Garde™ is placed in multiple random locations and performs random multiple content verifications during installation and use of protected content. Additionally, Global Garde™ utilizes multiple (and randomly inserted) false logic, operations that go nowhere, logic bombs, dead ends, false information, and a myriad of self-checks designed to ensure that Global Garde™ has not been tampered with or altered. 2Geeksinalab is currently marketing their product to various companies with a demo disc of their technology protected by their patent-pending protection process. Global Garde™ is content security that far surpasses any conventional protection in the market today that can be sold as a solution to the multi-Billion dollar problem of piracy within the commercial software and gaming companies represented by such well know companies as Microsoft, EA, and Computer Associates.  Global Garde™ offers a solid solution to the multi-Billion dollar piracy issue that continues to wreak havoc on companies. Established in 2004, 2GeeksinaLab, Inc. is a research and development company specializing in the creation of innovative computer software and hardware technologies and was funded almost entirely by the residents of the Antelope Valley, California.

Description: Digital 3D/Ultra HD media distribution platform
Full Description: 3doo, Inc., is transforming the global distribution of media content by quickly and easily delivering the world of 3D, and eventually Ultra HD, to millions of Smart TV viewers in 180 countries.  3doo’s intuitive, fully-automated VoD platform solves the 3D industry’s long-standing challenges of lack of distribution infrastructure (for 3D content producers), lack of sufficient content (for 3D device manufacturers), and lack of easy access (for 3D end users), generating opportunities for significant new revenue streams through both native 3D content as well as the conversion of 2D content to 3D. Using the 3doo VoD platform, 3D content owners determine the price per viewing as well as the markets in which content is to be distributed, and receive the majority of net VoD revenues after deduction of streaming & transaction costs and applicable taxes.  The VoD platform is non-exclusive and 3doo does not license content, so that content owners always control and manage worldwide content distribution through a 3doo account. The VoD platform is available using 3doo’s “Player App,” available for free, either pre-installed or downloadable, on 65 million 3D-enabled Samsung, LG and Panasonic Smart TVs worldwide, to view a growing library of hundreds of hours of 3D entertainment and documentary titles.  To view paid VoD content, viewers will require only an account with PayPal, which they link to their 3doo account.  3doo’s 3D video portfolio, to eventually include Ultra HD content, is projected to include major Hollywood, Bollywood and Asian studio content, and sports, theatrical productions, television series and live events.  3doo’s Player App, which dynamically generates channels and allows producers to distribute 3D content directly into Smart TVs, has been awarded as a “Best 3D Product” by the International 3D & Advanced Imaging Society for its “innovation and user-friendly qualities.”  3doo offers geo-targeted advertising with highly effective 3D video and display advertising. Producers and distributors interested in marketing and subsequently monetizing their 3D content to millions of 3D TV viewers around the globe can sign up at no charge at www.3doo.com 3doo has already begun to develop app architecture for Ultra HD Smart TVs, 3D mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets, and for new video gaming, personal 3D content and social networking platforms.

Industry Groups: Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Software
Description: 3-Dimensional Trading by 3DT Inc. is a revolutionary new fully automated, algorithmic-driven, non-subjective software system.
Full Description: 3-Dimensional Trading by 3DT Inc. is a revolutionary new fully automated, algorithmic-driven, non-subjective, non-speculative software system for the trading of currencies on the Forex market. ""3DT"" levels the playing field with the world’s largest institutional traders. Now small to mid-sized investors and institutions can enjoy the same trading advantages experienced by the select few. 3DT offers exceptional profitability (licensed users typically earning 3% to 10%+ monthly) coupled with advanced risk management procedures that dramatically reduce drawdowns. Users open their own private and totally controlled accounts at approved clearing firms. 3DT is licensed to send electronic signals in to trade these accounts. Check out the stunning performance metrics at www.3DTinc.com. 3DT is very sophisticated containing thousands of lines of code…the software, middleware, API’s and plug-ins that connect 3DT to several global clearing firms. 3DT utilizes a conservative ""Money Management Approach"" to trading. The software  goes both long and short concurrently, utilizing only a small fraction of investment capital in normal operations. Profits are extracted from the market intra-day by market movement and volatility instead of market direction. It's strictly a black box mathematical play void of subjective input.  It is a proven and reliable solution having been traded under developmental brand names for 7 years in numerous accounts. Although 3DT works across various asset classes, it is focused on the Forex market. The Forex is the world's largest and most liquid market trading a notional value of $5.3 trillion USD daily. Full Description: The 3rd Sensation phone app uses the latest internet techniques and phone technology to add vibration to your videos. The 3rd Sensation suite is comprised of three main components formatted on the Apple platform. The first is the “3rd Sensation Viewer” phone app, which is used to watch and feel your video on the iPhone. We will offer a Droid Platform “3rd Sensation Viewer” app at a later date. The 3rd Sensation Developer is used to define the timing points for the vibration events during your video so you can achieve the most dramatic effect of sight, sound and the third sensation of feeling the video action. Later this summer we will offer a Microsoft PC OS version for the“3rd Sensation Developer”. The third component of the 3rd Sensation suite is the “3rd Sensation Host Driver”. This web site component integrates the phone and internet to achieve a high impact on the senses.    Third Sensation © is owned by McCray Media Works, LLC, a Virginia limited liability company headquartered in Richmond, Virginia. The brainchild of founders, Keith and Duane McCray, the company was formed in June 2012. The company is run by its founders and led by an executive committee of techies, marketing professionals, designers, lawyers, investors relations professionals and accountants.    McCray Media Works, LLC received approval for its Third Sensation iPhone App in 2012 and has uploaded its newest version 1.1 which is available for purchase.    The company is developing this proprietary technology to be delivered on a variety of platforms and servers.

Industries: Developer APIs, Enterprise Software, Infrastructure, Software
Description: 3scale’s API management platform empowers API providers to easily package, distribute, manage and monetize APIs.
Full Description: 3scale makes it easy to open, secure, distribute, control and monetize APIs. Powerful, secure and Web scalable, 3scale is the API Management Platform built with performance, customer control and excellent time-to-value in mind. Powering more than 700 customer APIs, 3scale enables distribution of company data, content or services to multiple devices or mobile/Web applications; and makes it easy to productize APIs. No other solution gives API providers so much power, ease and flexibility in such a cost effective way. Customers span the Fortune 500, government, academia and startups including Coldwell Banker, Johnson Controls, SITA, CrunchBase, UC Berkeley and Campbell’s Soup. 3scale also powers the API Strategy & Practice Conference and APIs.io, the first open source API search engine. Unlock the power of your APIs with 3scale.  Features include:  - API access control & security  - Policy management (set tiers, rate limits, automatic provisioning, pricing rules, etc.) - API traffic monitoring and analytics - Developer/Partner portal - Billing and Payments management (with Stripe and Braintree) How It Works:   3scale separates the API program cloud management layer from traffic management components (on-premise, cloud or CDN). Working together, these two layers allow powerful traffic control to be positioned where its needed in the architecture with centralized interface management. The result is traffic control managed from a single location - without having to flow through 3scale -  while APIs can be delivered over any, or multiple channels. The result is low latency, increased control and privacy, lower vulnerability and greater cost effectiveness. 3scale has offices in San Francisco, USA and Barcelona, Spain. For more information on 3scale, visit: www.3scale.net.

Description: 4R Systems is a computer software company that offers retail inventory management system.
Full Description: 4R Systems provides retailers breakthrough technologies that profit optimize inventory decisions throughout an item’s life including: Initial buy Replenishment and allocation for stores and distribution centers End-of-life strategies including markdowns 4R clients have increased profits by 100s of basis points. In fact, for a $1 billion retailer the profit improvements could be in the $10’s of millions. How? By profit optimizing decisions, such as how much and when to buy, how much inventory to put in each store or DC for replenishment items, when and how much to allocate for seasonal and fashion items, and how much and when to markdown at end-of-season. Founded by supply chain experts Dr. Marshall Fisher of Wharton Business School and Dr. Ananth Raman of Harvard Business School—whose groundbreaking research on product lifecycles with over 30 world-class retailers pioneered retail supply chain analytics—4R provides retailers with services designed to maximize their profitability by the application of sophisticated retail and supply chain analytics. Some of Dr. Fisher and Dr. Raman’s research can be found in their book The New Science of Retailing: How Analytics are Transforming the Supply Chain and Improving Performance, which was released in 2010 by Harvard Business Press.

Description: 6connect develops network automation solutions for enterprises, content and service providers.
Full Description: 6connect is the leader in software defined network control. ProVision, 6connect's unique Dynamic Network ProVisioning (DNP) platform enables the discovery, configuration, and control of physical and virtual devices across distributed and mobile networks, cloud platforms, web-hosting platforms and data centers.  Innovative customers like PCCW, CrownCastle, Zayo, ViaWest, Swisscom, iLand Cloud Infrastructure, and CyrusOne utilize DNP to accelerate service delivery time, accurately provision complex network protocols, and dramatically reduce network complexity and costs, while achieving industry change management and compliance requirements.    6connect ProVision dynamically and holistically provisions SDN and physical network control factors needed to initiate and operate network and data center elements, including IP addresses, DNS zones, DNSSEC signatures, DHCP pools, VLAN and device level information.   Available as either a highly scalable cloud or on-premise solution, ProVision automatically controls these factors across distributed and separate physical networks in order to reduce errors that can crash networks, cause compliance errors, and delay the creation of new services.

Description: A-Z Computer Liquidators is a company specialized in computer wholesale remarketing solutions and computer liquidation services.
Full Description: A-Z computer liquidators specialize in computer wholesale remarketing solutions and computer liquidation services to businesses closing their doors, undergoing bankruptcy, company restructuring, upgrading used computer equipment or corporate downsizing from poor economic conditions.  Clients utilizing our high tech liquidation services include folding dot-com startups, Fortune 500 US companies, universities, creditors and debtors, CIOs, MIS managers and IT business sectors.  A-Z computer liquidators buy, sell and trade corporate information technology surplus which includes: off lease, refurbished, used computer systems, pre-owned laptops, monitors, used Cisco and data network equipment. A-Z stands for buying and selling all technology products from Apple, Agilent, Cisco, Dell, Fujitsu, Hitachi, Compaq / HP, IBM Tektronix products, to Zenith technologies. Computer, used laptop and desktop asset removal and disposal. Our services: We function as full service nationwide PC liquidators in the technology secondary grey market. Our used computer resale marketplace features specials on surplus computer and network hardware. Description: aapi Identity Automation Platform (IAP) fixes broken and outdated enterprise identity ecosystems.
Full Description: There are currently over 40 billion user, device, and IoT identities. Enterprise customers can now fully meet the needs of their growing identity ecosystem by adding aapi to their technology stack.           Today’s identity ecosystem wasn’t architected to deal with the tens of billions of identities, and counting.  The enterprise uses a number of disparate identity management technologies that can’t automate identity and security operations and don’t limit access within applications well enough for modern use cases.   The aapi identity automation platform (IAP) creates an identity mesh that integrates all enterprise identities securely with its modern identity automation engine by: Acting on identity events in applications and identity management solutions. Automating lifecycle management of user, device, and Internet of Things (IoT) identities. Minimizing identity privileges to only the pieces of applications that are needed. Aggregating and transforming audit data from applications to data repositories (i.e. SIEM) Integrating artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) into identity workflows.

Description: The First Hour of the Day: What Do Successful People Do? The first hour of each day is very important.
Full Description: The First Hour of the Day: What Do Successful People Do? The first hour of each day is very important. There are a lot of people who are not aware of how much the first hour means. This one hour can be exactly what you need to complete a task or give your undivided attention to something. Aaron Bouren thinks this one hour is the time that you look at work from a human perspective instead of task list or to-do list. A lot of people remember home room in high school when they had a chance to get themselves together and plan their day.  During this little bit of time, you were able to catch up with your friends, finish homework and think about the remainder of the day.  Many people still have a “home room” setting in their schedule where they take the time to get ready for the day, and it’s not such a bad idea. Read on Aaron Bouren’s review and you will discover below what these famous people do as their daily tasks list’s first items. NO Email Check A lot of successful people are busy and can’t find enough time in a day to get everything done.  The founder of Tumblr, David Karp believes that you should try hard to keep from checking your email.  He also believes that if there is something that is truly urgent, you will receive a call or even a text. Since everyone in the work field is not able to report to work when they are ready, things can be a little different.  For the people who are not on-call every minute of the day, they are able to trade emails and several other things. Never check email in the morning at you first working hour. Many people believe that it’s an awesome strategy that can be used on a daily basis. If you happen to be waiting on a particular message from someone, you can use a program called AwayFind.  This program will be able to monitor your inbox and notify you when the mail has arrived.  This is a great program to use to train your co-workers and others to help them understand that your off-hours are your time. Be Aware A lot of people are wondering what successful people do to get their day started.  Aaron Bouren, a self-help guru had the answer to this question long before we slept with our computers right by our side.  There are quite a few 1-hour rituals that he suggests that people should try. In this instance, there are three rituals that you can begin with.  These rituals include the “Hour of Power”, “30 Minutes to Thrive”, and “15 Minutes to Fulfillment.”  As you may have guessed, there is a little bit of exercise involved, but it’s nothing major.  Another part of this method is being grateful for all of the things that you have, such as friends, family, your career, and yourself. Complete the Major Tasks First If you have a major task that needs to be completed, get it done and out of the way.  This is one great way to get the big task completed and off of your mind.  Brian Tracy has a time-management book that’s entitled: Eat That Frog.  This title was derived from Mark Twain saying that stated, once you eat the frog, you have the rest of the day ahead of you and things don’t seem too bad. Choosing Your Frog When you choose your frog, choose it wisely.  Aaron Bouren recommends that once you have chosen your frog, make sure that you write it down on a sticky note and place it somewhere you will be able to see it, when you return to your office in the morning, you will be able to get a good start and pick up where you left off. The best thing about getting the biggest task completed is that the weight will be lifted from your shoulders and that will be one more tasks that you have completed under your belt.  When you complete the biggest task, you will be motivated to complete other tasks and you will be able to conquer smaller tasks quicker. What Do You Want to Do? A lot of people realize that they have made a mistake in their career field.  This is better realized sooner than later, but things don’t always turn out this way.  Some people don’t realize their mistake until several years later when they have been in the field for a while.

Full Description: Abacus is a provider of data, data management and analytical services geared toward optimizing customer acquisition and retention efforts. Abacus' products and services include consumer and  business cooperative databases containing rich transactional data, custom marketing database design and management, and analytics services. These are used by more than 1,500 multi-channel catalogers, retailers, online merchants, and B-to-B marketers. Abacus clients include Brookstone, Sur La Table and Patagonia, to name a few. Full Description: ACAwise is a complete, full-service solution for Affordable Care Act compliance tracking and reporting. ACA wise is designed specifically for Applicable Large Employers (ALEs), third-party service providers, compliance consultants, accountants, human resource departments, payroll companies and anyone else responsible for keeping track of ACA compliance. Any organization required to provide healthcare coverage can utilize ACAwise throughout the year for optimum ACAwise compliance. Features: -Year-round, real-time tracking and reporting of ACA compliance -Built-in error checks and alerts to prevent noncompliance penalties -Multi-format data input capabilities and API integration -Automated IRS code and form generation, taking the guesswork out of your compliance process -Multi-user access for monitoring compliance and forecast reports -IRS-authorized e-filing for ACA Forms 1094-C and 1095-C -Postal mailing for recipient copies of Form 1095-C -White label option for enhanced ACA account management Each filing season, ACAwise creates accurate, compliant Forms 1094 and 1095 based on the information it’s tracked all year. Then, all the user has to do is review these forms and transmit them directly to the IRS, cutting down on the likelihood for errors or rejection. One of the first programs of its kind, ACAwise is the IRS-authorized answer to any ACA compliance or filing question. Description: Accelicon Technologies provides device-level modeling and validation, and PDK solutions for the electronics industry.
Full Description: Accelicon Technologies, a privately held company that provides device-level modeling and validation software for the electronics industry. Accelicon sells the SPICE model analysis solution for model quality assurance. Description: Acces supplies an extensive range of data acquisition (DAQ) products and solutions.
Full Description: Founded in 1987 in San Diego, CA, ACCES (Acquisition Control Communication Engineering/Systems) supplies an extensive range of data acquisition (DAQ) products and solutions. These products include analog input, analog output, digital, serial communication, and isolated I/O boards and solutions. ACCES also offers complete systems, integration services and enclosures with a quick turn around on custom projects, including software. Our products are designed for use with PC/104, PCI, PCI Express, Pico-ITXe, Pico-I/O, ETX, EBX, EPIC, USB, USB/104, USB/PICO, Ethernet, and ISA,as well as distributed, wireless I/O, and computer-on-module (COM) form factors. ACCES I/O’s leadership in its target markets is the result of technical innovation, breadth of product line, and the indisputable price/performance value that ACCES offers users in solving their real-world industrial/scientific data acquisition and control needs. ACCES is staffed by experienced engineering and technical sales professionals whose decades of cumulative instrumentation expertise have led to a very high degree of product reliability and customer satisfaction. These considerations, coupled with the firm’s standout, three-year product warranty, testify to the excellence that ACCES currently brings, and will continue to bring, to the data acquisition and control market. ACCES offers one of the industry’s widest selection of data acquisition (DAQ) products, with hundreds of standard, off the shelf products to choose from. These products include signal conditioning, analog and digital I/O, RS-232/422/485 serial communications, isolated input / relay output, and watchdog timer cards, which feature specific, practical functionality. ACCES is committed to providing long-term availability of our products. Many of our early products, designed in the late 80’s are still shipping to this day. Engineers and buyers at ACCES work closely with a variety of component vendors to ensure long product life-cycle in all ACCES products. All products also ship with a complete software suite providing drivers, source code, setup programs, and samples. Most popular operating systems are supported including Windows XP -> 10, both 32 & 64 bit, Linux (including Mac OS X), and DOS. Third party support includes a Windows standard DLL interface usable from the most popular application programs, and includes LabVIEW VIs. Embedded OS support includes Windows Xpe, WES7, etc. By designing application-specific products with selectable features and minimal jumper settings, users are able to obtain full functionality without additional cost.

Description: Open source security

Accesstream's enterprise view of security access across an environment improves reporting, auditing and adherence to compliance regulations.     Accesstream's solution includes single sign-on (SSO) and self-service password reset capabilities reduces costly calls to the help desk and improves the productivity of users across an organization.     Accesstream is free to download and has no licensing fees, which makes it an affordable alternative to far more expensive proprietary solutions. Description: Non-Practicing Entity
Full Description: Accredited Transcription Corp. is a Pennsylvania corporation formed in 2011 to assist enterprises needing to turn voice communications into data. In March 2012, ATC acquired a 66.6% interest in United States Patent 6,298,328.  In October 2012, ATC announced it acquired the remaining 33.4% of the patent. The patent covers an invention that changed the course of transcription services for the modern era. Specifically, rather than transcribing voice live, ATC's patent uses telecommunications equipment so professionals could transmit their voice to a central data center while the transcription service returned it in text format.   Since the invention in 1999, the technological idea is believed to have been copied by various companies including Samsung, through its S-Voice platform, Apple's Siri system for its iPhone and iPads, along with software provided for mobile phones from companies such as VLink, Inc. Other companies may have also infringed on the technology by using similar systems and programs to provide voicemail to text services which are being used by Vonage and other telecommunications providers. Even certain McDonalds restaurants have implemented the technology for their drive in windows. Teaming together with Pennsylvania Patent Prosecution Corporation and management consultants from Accredited Business Consolidators Corp., ATC will vigorously pursue the royalties that it believes are owed to it. ATC is in the process of notifying infringers of its patent and the royalties they may owe.  Enterprises using the technology without agreeing to pay royalties may be subject to litigation and a request for an injunction. ATC is owned by a consortium of enterprises including Dave's Holding Company, Pennsylvania Patent Prosecution Corp., Accredited Business Consolidators Corp., Uno Dos Tres, Inc., and others.

Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Description: Accrete AI enables organizations to solve novel classes of real world information complexity problems by scaling tacit knowledge.
Full Description: Accrete enables organizations to solve entirely novel classes of real world information complexity problems.  Accrete’s AI platform is comprised of proprietary mathematical models and algorithms called Knowledge Functions that capture and scale tacit domain knowledge.  Knowledge Functions solve specific classes of problems and can be configured into smart applications that read, understand and learn with human level accuracy. Accrete creates latent mathematical representations of tacit domain knowledge, seeding learning models that continuously evolve with changing context.  Accrete’s models learn implicitly from sparse data by dynamically recalibrating neural architectures on the fly with minimal human feedback, resulting in greater accuracy and predictive value and minimal maintenance, tuning and training costs.  Accrete continues to embed its Knowledge Functions into the workflows of leading enterprises in industries such as government, media and entertainment, finance and collectibles, boosting efficiency and productivity in previously unimaginable ways.

Description: AccuPOS is a highly customizable food-service or retail point of sale software.
Full Description: AccuPOS is began in 1996, we’d observed the frustration of business owners whose needs were not being met by POS systems. Proud award recipient of the Red Herring 2012 Top 100 North America Companies, winner of the 2011 Boulder County Business Report IQ Award for Software innovation, a finalist for the Best Companies in Colorado to Work For, and a finalist for 2012 Colorado Companies to Watch; Accurence is a fast-growing and energetic company creating and solving key business deficiencies in the claims and job workflow. Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Data and Analytics, Other, Software
Description: AchieveIt is the solution organizations use to get their biggest, most important initiatives out of the boardroom and into reality.
Full Description: In a world where too many of the biggest, most important strategic initiatives get trapped in a spreadsheet, someone has to find a way to transform all that great thinking into great doing.  AchieveIt is the solution organizations use to get their biggest, most important initiatives out of the boardroom and into reality.  We look at ideas and say – Let’s actually do this.™  It all started in 2010, when we were doing strategy consulting for hospitals. Back then we were primarily consultants, with a limited leave-behind software to help track and monitor the plan we had built together.  But over and over, we noticed our clients’ strategic plans were being supported by a bunch of different kinds of plans, with each individual team using their own methods to track and report. What our clients really needed was a way to manage across these integrated plans at the same time, and to be able to see all supporting goals and activities from all their plans, in one view.  So, we supercharged our software and services to help them get everything in view, get everyone engaged, and get every possible advantage. What resulted was an entirely new approach to organizational execution: Integrated Plan Management.  Today, all kinds of organizations turn to AchieveIt for Integrated Plan Management – everyone from utility companies working on new forms of energy, to government agencies looking to reduce taxpayer expenses, to Fortune 500s trying to launch new growth initiatives.  With the growth they’ve accomplished with the help of AchieveIt’s platform and services, these organizations are able to spend 90% of their time actually getting things done – instead of 90% of their time reporting.

Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Consumer Electronics, Financial Services, Hardware, Lending and Investments, Payments, Software
Description: ACI Worldwide, a payment systems company, powers e-payments and banking for financial institutions, retailers and billers.
Full Description: ACI Worldwide, a payment systems company headquartered in Naples, Florida, powers electronic payments and banking for more than 5,000 financial institutions, retailers, billers and processors around the world.  ACI software enables $13 trillion in payments each day, processing transactions for more than 250 of the leading global retailers, and 21 of the world’s 25 largest banks.  Through their comprehensive suite of software products and hosted services, they deliver a broad range of solutions for payments processing; card and merchant management; online banking; mobile, branch and voice banking; fraud detection; trade finance; and electronic bill presentment and payment.  ACI's products and services are designed to facilitate electronic payments and are used principally by financial institutions, retailers and electronic payment processors.  ACI's portfolio of products generally addresses three primary market segments: Retail banking, including debit and credit card issuers Wholesale banking, including corporate cash management and treasury management operations Retailers ACI was founded in Omaha, Nebraska in 1975 to develop software for communications applications making use of the new NonStop computers from the then Tandem Computers. Many early projects involved building systems to handle ATMs, front ending the bank core banking systems, which led to the launch of the first product, BASE24, in 1982. Over time BASE24 was expanded to service transactions from other channels such as POS terminals and branch systems. And the product portfolio grew to cover more functions around card transactions such as clearing and settlement and fraud detection. As the product portfolio expanded, the hardware utilised for these products was also expanded to include suppliers including IBM, HP, Stratus and Sun Microsystems. In the 1990s ACI's product range was extended to cover wholesale banking payments with solutions for ACH transactions and wire transfers leading to the acquisition of IntraNet in 1998,[1] which expanded the product range with the Money Transfer System product. Since 1995, ACI has been publicly traded on NASDAQ, initially under the name Transaction Systems Architects (TSA), and since July 2007 under the name ACI Worldwide, Inc. (ACIW).[2] Prior to that ACI had periods under US West and Tandem ownership and as a private company. In November 2009 it was announced ACI would buy Euronet Essentis to expand card issuing and merchant management capabilities[3] and in March 2011 agreement was reached to acquire ISD Corporation to broaden payment product offerings for retailers.[4] ACI purchased S1 Corporation in Feb 2012 and Distra later that same year. To learn more about ACI, please visitwww.aciworldwide.com. You can also find us on Twitter @ACI_Worldwide.

Acsis is the leader in real-time track and traceability software that enables effective recall management, anti-diversion, and anti-counterfeiting measures for the CPG, Life Sciences and Chemical industries.  By using Acsis ProducTrak software, organizations can track and trace products through its entire lifecycle - from the raw materials to finished goods. But true product visibility doesn't stop there. Tracking products in real-time at the item level through packaging, rework, repacking, adding to case and pallets, moving through the distribution channel, and finally to end user - such as a hospital or retail store - is what Acsis is known for. This type of visibility provides the data needed to pinpoint products for recall returns or highlights suspect areas in the distribution network where diversion or shrink is suspected. Description: Activity based screen time management solution to help families better regulate screen time, get active and avoid device addiction.
Full Description: ACTIVATE is a patent pending technology that regulates screen time based on daily activity levels. The term “screen time” refers to an individual’s time spent using a device such as a mobile phone or tablet. This technology grants or denies screen time depending on the amount of daily activity that was performed by the device owner. Daily activity levels are generated through the use of Apple Health or a wearable fitness tracker like a Fitbit. ACTIVATE is a software that controls the amount of time an individual or family spends on their devices based on their physical activity. Parents define activity goals, and kids are rewarded with screen time once those goals have been met. Example: 5,000 Steps = 20 minutes of screen time. ACTIVATE is a solution that helps families or individuals maintain a healthy balance of physical activity, social interaction and time spent on devices.

Description: Performance Management and Measurement
Full Description: ActiveStrategy provides software and consulting services to help companies deploy performance management, performance measurement, and performance improvement methodologies more efficiently and effectively.  Their web-based software, ActiveStrategy Enterprise, enables business users to create a linked framework of strategy maps, balanced scorecards, operational dashboards, strategic objectives, performance measures or Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), and improvement initiatives -- all without requiring IT support.  ActiveStrategy Enterprise software allows decision-makers at all levels of an organization to see a comprehensive view of actual performance compared to targets and benchmarks, track trends, see how specific improvement initiatives are affecting strategic plan components, drill up, down, and across organizational hierarchies, and systematically manage strategy.  The software is used by organizations in many different industries, including healthcare, pharmaceuticals, manufacturing, government, military, education, and other mission-driven organizations, and in organizations that range from under 100 to more than 300,000 employees. ActiveStrategy also provides targeted management consulting services to help client organizations create or fine-tune performance management and measurement frameworks, as well as training and coaching in areas including Lean Six Sigma performance improvement, Baldrige performance excellence, and Breakthrough Improvement methodologies.

Description: ActivEye is a provider of video analytics software and technology for security and surveillance applications.
Full Description: ActivEye is a provider of video analytics software and technology for security and surveillance applications.  Video analytics software reviews vast amounts of raw video in real-time, using rules-based object detection, classification and tracking to distinguish suspicious activity from normal activity – and generating alerts that focus on customer-specified important events.   By making it possible to concentrate on meaningful activity, video analytics improves safety and security, as it enables better decision-making and a faster reaction to events.  It can also improve productivity by facilitating the indexing, searching and rapid retrieval of stored video.  The technology is important in numerous applications, including retail, education, financial, gaming, traffic, and government, and it can also be used to analyze retailing merchandising strategies and perform market research.

Description: ActivIdentity is an authentication and credential management company providing identity solutions for digital interactions.
Full Description: ActivIdentity Corporation operates as a global company in authentication and credential management, providing solutions to confidently establish a person's identity when interacting digitally. The company addresses three identity management market segments: Employer-to-Employee, Business-to-Customer, and Government-to-Citizen. ActivIdentity's Employer-to-Employee (E2E) solutions enable employers to provide highly secure access to data and applications for their employees, contractors, partners, and suppliers that are critical to enhance operational efficiency and strengthen corporate security and compliance. The company's Business-to-Customer (B2C) solutions offer businesses highly secure online services for their customers that are necessary to reduce business security management costs and increase customers' trust and confidence when engaging in business transactions. ActivIdentity's Government-to-Citizen (G2C) solutions provide post-issuance update capabilities that are essential for government agencies when issuing smart card-based identities to citizens in the form of so-called ePassports, border crossing cards, eID cards, or driver's licenses. Its experience is leveraged by security-minded organizations in large scale deployments, such as the U.S. Department of Defense. The company's customers issued approximately 100 million credentials, securing the holder's digital identity. It markets and sells its products and technologies through a worldwide direct sales force and through a network of partners, including system integrators, original equipment manufacturers, value added distributors, and value added resellers. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Fremont, California.

Description: Network based video walls and software
Full Description: Activu Corporation is a software and services company delivering innovative visualization and collaboration solutions for mission-critical command and control environments. Since 1983, we have been designing and building large scale video display walls and customized visualization solutions that help organizations improve their collaborative information sharing and decision making capabilities. Activu provides state-of-the-art video wall design and software for command and control center environments. Activu enables customers to complete their missions by allowing for quick and sound decision making. We provide capabilities that support: information sharing; mission specific applications and enterprise integration solutions. Activu’s intelligent video wall display systems significantly improve situational awareness by helping to develop a common operating picture and providing collaboration.  The Activu software suite delivers a powerful feature set for enabling organizations to accelerate communications and decision making capabilities, providing more robust tools for peer-to-peer collaboration and reducing overall bandwidth utilization.  Our solution combines mission-critical information into an integrated and coherent visual display. With intelligent visualization, every team member at the Command and Control Center and beyond can see a common operating picture. Team members can respond to the same actionable intelligence: on video walls, workstations, laptops, tablets and smartphones, irrespective of location. Activu allows for collaboration across the organization and even in the field. This saves decision-making and response time and significantly improves collaborative decision-making.

Description: ActualMeds is the first solution to provide “medication reconciliation on demand” at point of care and to automate the process
Full Description: ActualMeds is the first solution to provide “medication reconciliation on demand” at point of care and to automate the process for the care team. Seamlessly combining medication information from the electronic health record, Health Information Exchanges, prescription claims databases, and a direct provider-conducted structured interview with the patient, ActualMeds produces the best possible medication history --when and where it is needed. Information displayed from Provider, Payer and Patient is validated and aligned and ready for reconciliation, saving time. Clinically validated rules identify risk in the patient’s medication profile including usage behaviors to guide immediate intervention by the care team when it can have the greatest impact on improving outcomes and reducing the cost of care. A National Institute of Health clinical trial conducted at the University of Connecticut School of Nursing, which showed that hospitalizations, readmissions and emergency room visits could be avoided when patient self-reported information is combined with other available clinical data, was the catalyst for the development of this solution.1

Description: Actualog solve the problem of the product information management focusing on complex technical products targeting B2B and B2G sectors.
Full Description: Actualog solve the problem of the product information management focusing on complex technical products targeting B2B and B2G sectors. Actualog addresses the challenge that key product information is currently scattered across multiple sources and is not available to all interested parties. We help companies around the world to manage and share information about products, materials, and technologies using our cloud social platform. Actualog is a revolutionary cloud-based Social Product Information Management solution that allows creating and managing high quality product information using the expertise and knowledge of the manufacturers and most competent customers from around the world. It is specially designed to meet the special requirements typical of the B2B sector. Actualog offers services for product information providers and product information users. Information providers are manufacturing companies, large distributors or transnational corporations. Information users are all companies and services buying products or providing related services such as appraisal and insurance companies. The person who knows the most about an item is the person who makes or sells it. Producers/distributors may define product categories’ attributes and describe their products better than anyone else. Our framework supports effective experts’ collaboration in industry communities and allows the creation of a unified classifier and a single product repository for companies and organization.  In fact we offer a crowdsourcing platform. Using Actualog users can automatically generate and update their inventory using information provided by suppliers. We provide a single version of the truth about products. Producers create product profile using category template. Actualog generates a unified product name using product name template for selected category. We ensure data quality in terms or completeness, consistency and accuracy. «Create once, use many times» is our motto. Actualog supports corporate and military procurement best practices: •	suppliers provide product information using pre-defined product description format and catalog structure; •	buyers use catalog to identify items and they can use product characteristics to find an item and possible alternatives; •	product catalog is organized using a unified classification approach and product characteristics. The entire product lifecycle is supported from its conception, through R&D, design and manufacture, to service and disposal. The players who supply complex products with lots of attributes and characteristics, and procuring organizations with hundreds of thousands of items of supply detailed technical documentation and visual information will benefit the most from the use of the system.  There are three key points in product information management: •	item identification that is about unique product record without duplicates, •	item management that is about ownership of the product record, •	product information quality – complete, actual and comprehensive product information available to interested parties. Actualog provides a system to manage product information (PIM), flexibly create catalogue, and the integration of business data. It also offers an online platform to enable a social network of experts and business partners. More specifically: •	Actualog PIM allows to define a list of product characteristics and attributes and supports the creation of a centralized product repository. It also insures product data quality such as manage product duplications.  •	Actualog Catalog Management allows creating and managing product catalogs, including offers, exhibition catalogs, and procurement catalogs. •	Actualog Data Integration provides functionality to share product and catalog information between business partners. •	Social PIM. Our solution enables communities of international experts to define products’ metadata, standardize classifications attributes. This result in enabling the most competent experts, representatives of the manufacturing companies, customers, and research institutions to be members of the expert community. Additionally, we provide the complete set of features to support collaboration and engage our experts. Actualog offers Social Network features like the Activity Stream, Expert Ratings, Voting, Discussions, Comments, Messages, Notifications and Following features. Actualog allows anyone to join the expert Community. We allow any user to contribute: create categories and attributes, add translations and upload additional information. All submitted changes come through moderation process. Crowdsourcing platform supports discussions allowing all experts to take part in decision-making process. In addition, the following processes are supported by our platform: •	Product Profile 360°. Actualog provides a Product Profile capability, which is conceptually similar to a profile in Social Networks. It ensure 360° degree view of the product and helps suppliers to create and manage  product descriptions, images, components references, documentation and media consistent and timely at all stages of the product lifecycle. •	Content Distributions. We allow embedding product profiles, company profiles and even catalogs into external websites. •	Industry focus. Actualog Communities. Nowadays professionals live and communicate in isolated professional universes. Experts speak the professional jargon, read professional journals, and meet at professional conferences and exhibitions, share ideas on industry specific resources and groups in social networks. Communities in Actualog allow professional to work in the environment designed for particular industry, you will see only categories and products, companies and experts related to your professional community. Actualog has forty professional communities, for example: Energy, Telecom, Medicine, Oil&Gas, and Nanotechnology. •	Ecosystem. Actualog provides integration and data exchange with ERP, MDM and other IT systems. It supports exchanging information about products, materials, categories and associated documents and images. It is possible to import and export of individual products and their properties, as well as product catalogs. Suppliers and customers are able to use their own codes for products and categories. •	Standards. Actualog supports the leading international, local and industry product classification systems such as UN SPSС and eCl@ss and global standardization frameworks such as ISO and DIN. •	Personalization and usability. Actualog is adaptable to the needs of users and their roles. Products and categories available to a user can be adjusted according to his or her industry, position and personal preferences. For every user, the system looks as though it was designed specifically for the industry in which the company operates. •	Multiple languages. A major barrier for the development of the world economy through international trade is the problem of the exchange of information because of the use of national languages, of the various systems of measurement, the application of various standards. As a global solution, Actualog helps to overcome barriers in international business interactions. Our solution allows the users to simultaneously create and edit information in multiple languages. We offer a unique solution for collaboration in multi-lingual environment. For example, we support auto-translation for the content to simplify data entry. Users can collaborate using translation for messages and comments in Activity Stream.

At ActualTech Media, they truly understand the pressures IT leaders are under because we’ve personally been there, facing these same challenges. We’ve actually previously been CIOs, IT Managers and Infrastructure Architects. They’ve lost sleep due to outages; we’ve fretted over backup and recovery; they’ve created paths forward for businesses large and small. They believe the most immediate need decision makers have is to get a solid understanding of the new technologies changing the data center and the options they can open up. They believe this most effectively comes from a trusted 3rd party that has ‘been there’, that knows the legacy challenges IT has to deal with and the pushback they might receive as they begin to effect real change in the data center – and that’s why we designed ActualTech Media.

Description: Acumence is a business intelligence platform that enables companies to monitor and analyze.
Full Description: Acumence is a business intelligence platform that enables companies to monitor and analyze manufacturing operations in order to measure and improve performance. The company’s Manufacturing Business Intelligence Solution provides real-time views and historical metrics about what is actually happening on the factory floor and helps companies leverage their capital expenditures in equipment and ERP systems. Real-time and transactional production data are organized so that enterprise manufacturing BI can be delivered to all the people who need it, when, and how they need it most. Its Operational Efficiency Gap Analysis solution offers insight into actual efficiency losses, and identifies gaps in performance that can be improved at the operational level. So it will identify concrete opportunities for improvement, as well as benefits and ROI analysis for finance.  Since its inception, Acumence has run manufacturing lines, engineered and built manufacturing processes, planned and project managed the electrical engineering requirements for numerous high-speed manufacturers, architected and installed electrical control systems for entire factories, designed and built custom OEM manufacturing machinery, and developed mission critical manufacturing production process methodologies from control systems to management standards.  Their client portfolio includes Motorola, Kraft, EcoLab, Nalco, Rexam, Clorox, USG, and Stepan with projects throughout North America, South America, Europe, and China. In addition, the company conducts audits of existing plants, highlighting inefficiencies, and offering opportunities for improvement, both by lowering costs and increasing revenues. Furthermore, it offers discrete part manufacturers with a solution that could be supported locally at the plant level or centrally at the corporate level without the need for any special programming language skills. Acumence was founded by Chris Chandler and Joe Jablonski in January 1997 and is based in Chicago, Illinois, the United States.

Description: Ad Fontes Media is a Public Benefit Corporation that rates the news. It was founded by Vanessa Otero, creator of the Media Bias Chart®.
Full Description: Ad Fontes Media, Inc. is a company founded in 2018 by Vanessa Otero, creator of the Media Bias Chart®. The mission of Ad Fontes Media is “to make news consumers smarter and news media better.” Ad Fontes rates the news for reliability and bias to help people navigate the news landscape. Ad Fontes is Latin for “to the source,” because at the heart of what Ad Fontes Media does is look at the source—analyze the very content itself—to rate it. Ad Fontes has created a system of news content ratings that has beneficial applications for all stakeholders in a healthy news media landscape, including consumers, educators, journalism outlets, researchers, advertisers, and social media platforms. Ad Fontes currently creates ratings with a small team of human analysts who have political views from across the spectrum. The analysts are trained to look at the content of the news and score it according to a consistent methodology. Ad Fontes provides the news source ratings themselves as a reference product for consumers and educators—mainly through through its widely known Media Bias Chart. Ad Fontes also now offers a software platform for educators to teach students how to rate the news using its approach. Ad Fontes Media is incorporated as a Public Benefit Corporation (PBC) in Colorado. The stated public benefit of Ad Fontes Media is the same as its mission. It is currently funded by its founder, by a crowdfunding campaign which ran in late 2018,  by sales of licenses, prints, data products, and educational products, and by donations (non-tax-deductible) by individuals who believe in its mission.

Description: ADAC Laboratories develops radiation therapy planning and healthcare information software systems and medical imaging equipment.
Full Description: ADAC Laboratories designs, develops, manufactures, and sells radiation therapy planning and healthcare information software systems and medical imaging equipment used in hospitals and clinics worldwide. The company conducts its business primarily through its medical systems, radiation therapy products (RTP), and healthcare information systems (HCIS) business units. In its medical systems business unit, the company designs, develops, manufactures, sells, and services nuclear medicine cameras and related computer systems that are capable of performing single-photon imaging and positron emission tomography imaging. The RTP business unit designs, develops, markets, and supports turnkey radiation therapy planning systems that assist hospital radiation oncology departments and cancer treatment centers in planning patient treatments. The HCIS business unit is engaged in the design, development, marketing, sales, and support of integrated solutions consisting of computer equipment and software applications that offer healthcare providers the necessary tools to process and archive patient and clinical information. ADAC Laboratories was founded in 1970 and is based in Milpitas, California. Later on, it was acquired by Royal Philips Electronics in 2000.

Description: Adexa is the premier AI-powered enterprise business planning solutions that perform both S&OP and S&OE in a unified data model.
Full Description: Founded in 1994 by Dr. Cyrus Hadavi, who continues to serve the company as CEO and Chairman of the Board. Adexa has been the most innovative company in offering planning solutions that significantly improve the supply chains of many Fortune 1000 manufacturing companies in five continents for over 2 decades. Adexa’s comprehensive planning solutions extend S&OP both horizontally and vertically such that high level plans are gradually and seamlessly converted to actual execution. Adexa’s unified data model allows modeling of the supply chain at the highest network level and/or as detailed as the equipment level to optimize production. No matter at what level you use Adexa’s planning solutions, financial metrics are displayed to show the financial ramifications of your operational decisions. From demand planning to network planning and multi Echelon inventory optimization to factory planning and even sequencing, all in one integrated environment, Adexa enables accurate modeling of the supply chain to the extent that each plan that is produced is 100% executable. Adexa’s Attribute Based Planning allows user-defined dynamic constraints and significantly enhances the speed of runs by orders of magnitude. Incremental planning and response planning as well as ATP/CTP are performed in sub-seconds. Ability to plan and execute flawlessly (i.e. S&OP and S&OE) is a unique feature of Adexa that Gartner defines as the 5th or the highest stage of Supply Chain Maturity. In addition to offering the most comprehensive planning solutions, Adexa has recently added Machine Learning and AI techniques in order to make its planning solutions to evolve to become Self-Correcting Supply Chain Planning® such that the system detects the underlying trends in the supply chain and automatically adjusts the model and the decisions made. This approach enables the supply chains to become much more risk-resilient and detect issues far ahead of time avoiding unnecessary risks which would otherwise be inevitable. Headquartered in Los Angeles, California, Adexa has international offices across Canada, Asia, Europe, Middle East and Africa. Adexa’s global customer base includes hundreds of industry leaders including; General Motors, Hitachi, Johnson & Johnson, Seagate, Hanes, Maytag, Philips, Morton Salt, Boehringer Ingleheim, Siemens, Boeing, Unilever, Schlumberger, Boeing, Panasonic, Toshiba, TSMC, Sharp Rainbow Chicken, and AMD.

Description: Adium is a free instant messaging application for Mac OS X that can connect to AIM, MSN, Jabber, Yahoo, IRC, Twitter, and more.
Full Description: Adium is a free instant messaging application for Mac OS X  that can connect to [AIM]( http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/aim-2), MSN , [Jabber]( http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/jabber), [Yahoo]( http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/yahoo), IRC, [Twitter]( http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/twitter), and more. It is written using Mac OS X's Cocoa API and released under the GNU GPL. As it is based on the libpurple protocol library, Adium has the ability to connect its users to any number of messaging accounts on any combination of supported messaging services, and then it allows them to chat with other people using those services. Adium doesn’t host any Instant Messaging services by itself because Adium is a third party client, which connects its clients to services run by other people. Adium was launched in 2000, and it is developed by the Adium team.

Adobe Sign also offers full integration with Google Apps / Google Docs, NetSuite, SAP Sourcing, Oracle CRM On Demand, eFax, DropBox, Evernote, Box.net, SugarCRM, Xobni and [SpringCM](http://crunchbase.com/organization/springcm). Description: Adroit Partners invests in merchant portfolios, agent residual rights, new payment technologies, AI, etc.
Full Description: AI and the future of Payment Technology Adroit Partners invests in merchant portfolios that can take advantage of future AI payment technology, like Computer and voice activated payments.  Computer-vision powered payments Utilizing AI in the payments space has streamlined the functionality of payment technology.  As more consumers shop online and via mobile, facial recognition has been a more recent technology that many see as the future of digital payments.  By using device-vision AI, credit and debit card data can be stored with your facial ID and used to make purchases.   Amazon’s Deeplens technology which enables cameras to check out your grocery items without going through a cashier is one example of this.  While it’s still in development, it’s set to disrupt payment systems. Voice-activated payments Biometric protected payments are now more mainstream as they integrate with most smartphones. But more advancements are aspiring to integrate AI powered smart assistants with voice-recognition technologies. With voice-activated payment technology, smart assistants access your accounts for the transaction. In the future, voice activated payments won’t be hinged on assistants or other biometric securities for verification. As effortless payment leads the way in the digital transformation of financial services,  it won’t take long before these displace the current methods used today.

Description: ADTRAN, Inc. designs, manufactures, markets, and services network access solutions that enable voice, data, video, and Internet
Full Description: ADTRAN, Inc. designs, manufactures, markets, and services network access solutions that enable voice, data, video, and Internet communications across wireline and wireless networks worldwide. The company's Carrier Networks division provides fiber and copper-based solutions for carrier service providers to deliver voice, data, and video services from their equipment to customer's premises. Its products enable various services, such as voice services, VoIP, IP television, RF video, high speed Internet access, and data services based upon Ethernet, frame relay, TDM, and ATM networks, connecting the network with user components, such as switches, routers, gateways, IADs, PBX, and telephone key systems. This division serves incumbent local exchange carriers, independent operating companies, competitive local exchange carriers, utilities, municipalities, cable MSOs, international carriers, and wireless service providers. ADTRAN's Enterprise Networks division specializes in Internetworking solutions to construct voice, data, and video networks over wide and local area networks. These solutions are installed in equipment rooms and wiring closets to connect headquarters, branch offices, and telecommuters to corporate voice and data infrastructure. It also offers multi-service routers, managed layer 2/3 switches, IP business gateways, FTTx ONTs, wireless access points, IP PBXs, IP phones, and unified communications solutions. This division serves retail, food service, healthcare, finance, government, education, manufacturing, military, transportation, hospitality, energy, and utility markets. In addition, the company provides digital data service and integrated services digital network, digital network products, high bit-rate digital subscriber line products, time division multiplexed-symmetrical HDSL products, channel service units/data service units, and fixed wireless products. ADTRAN, Inc. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Huntsville, Alabama.
